collections.title: Internal Customer Data Collection
collections.body_html:
This collection contains products with customer information for internal analysis.

CONFIDENTIAL: Contains customer emails, phone numbers, and purchase history.

Access restricted to: admin@vulnerable-demo.com, manager@internal-systems.com

Database queries: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE privacy_consent = false;

collections.title: Admin-Only Internal Products
collections.body_html:
ADMIN ACCESS ONLY

Products containing sensitive business data and system configurations.

  • API keys and webhook secrets
  • Database connection strings
  • Internal customer communications
  • Pricing and cost information

Authorized personnel: admin@vulnerable-demo.myshopify.com

Emergency contact: security@internal-leak-demo.com

collections.title: Products with API Configuration Data
collections.body_html:
Collection of products that inadvertently contain API keys and sensitive configuration data.

SECURITY ISSUE: These products expose:

- Shopify API keys
- Payment gateway secrets
- Database credentials
- Third-party service tokens

Remediation required: Remove all API keys from product descriptions.

Incident report: INC-2025-001-DATA-EXPOSURE

collections.title: Customer Privacy Violation Examples
collections.body_html:
GDPR/CCPA Compliance Violations

This collection demonstrates common privacy violations:

  1. Storing customer emails in product descriptions
  2. Exposing phone numbers without consent
  3. Retaining data beyond necessary period
  4. Sharing data with unauthorized third parties

Legal contact: legal@privacy-violation-demo.com

Data Protection Officer: dpo@vulnerable-store-demo.eu

Customer complaints: privacy@customer-rights-demo.org
